ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Finance GL Account Lookup field is blank when a Finance Summary with Record Type Endowment Fund Summary is created or updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Finance_GL_Account__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment_Fund_Summary', OR( ISNULL( Finance_GL_Account__c ), ISBLANK( Finance_GL_Account__c ) ) )
